group_1.textCenter: My Hiko-kun, who could teach me about anything@I wasn't able to even think of...
You've always been special to this cutie!
...[wait:0.8][chara:102801:lipSynch_1]Hehe. It's super unusual for you to be@embarrassed and all!★
Once we started elementary school, our families@began getting along.
We went to school and community events@together— It was lots of fun, yeah?
You mean the summer festival where this cutie@wore a yukata, right?

group_1.textLeft: Hiko-kun, Hiko-kun's mother, I'm sorry for being@late.

group_1.textRight: Don't worry, I'm sure you girls have a lot of things@to do.

group_1.textLeft: But... I wanted you to see how perfectly adorbs@this cutie is, so...
What d'you think...?@I look good in this yukata, right...?
...Why are you totally silent?@Say something, c'mon.

group_1.narration: "I knew you weren't good with words,@but I was thinkin' a little praise would be nice,@or maybe you weren't interested in me,@and stuff."
"So I got pissed off and left everyone on my own,@planning to go around the festival by myself..."
"But then this cutie made the crazy@lame-ass move of getting lost.@It was sooo uncool for realsies, right..."

group_1.textCenter: Uh-oh... I can't find the way to where Hiko-kun is...

group_1.textRight: You didn't come back at all...so I came looking@for you...
Let's go back to our parents...

group_1.narration: "You coming to find me made me super happy,@but I was stubborn and couldn't be honest with you...@With how selfish cute lil' me was,@no wonder you would get fed up with me."
"But when you said 'okay,'@I got sad and began cryin'..."

group_1.textRight: I'll take you back even if you don't feel like going,@Himena-chan.
You may not want to go back, but...
I'm giving you...this, so can we go back together...?

group_1.narration: ―Himena―@A ring... Can I really take it...?
―Hiko―@...You know, Himena-chan, you look good in that yukata.
―Hiko―@Earlier, I didn't say it right away...so this is my apology...
―Himena―@...With you suddenly givin' me a ring like this,@cute lil' me doesn't know what to do...!
―Himena―@I mean, Hiko-kun, you know what it means@to give a ring to a girl, yeah...?
―Hiko―@Uh, it's just a toy ring I bought at a stall though...
―Himena―@Who cares if it's real or a toy?!@Receivin' a ring is all that counts!

group_1.textLeft: If you're cool with it...@Will you go out...with this cutie...?

group_1.textRight: That...[chara:801300:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:801300:lipSynch_1]@Well, if you're sure you're okay with me...

group_1.textLeft: This cutie's okay with it 'cause you're okay with it,@Hiko-kun!
...[wait:0.8][chara:801600:lipSynch_1][chara:801600:cheek_1][chara:801600:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json]Hiko-kun, tell me you love me someday, 'kay?

group_1.textCenter: Since then, we'd spent a lot of time together.@Play dates at home, having short outings...
We spent sooo much time together.
We had fun when it was just the two of us.
But as we got into higher grades, Hiko-kun began@getting bullied at school.
And every day was a battle...
There was a time when this cutie could still step in@and stop them, and the sitch got a bit better.
But stuff only got much worse after we entered@middle school...
